actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, HUD, DOT,HHS, ACIR.
Referred to Subcommittee on Intergovernmental Relations and Human Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Intergovernmental Relations and Human Resources

official_title: A bill to provide that housing assistance paid with respect to certain dwelling units shall be excluded from the income and resources of the occupants of such units for purposes of other Federal assistance programs.

summary.text: Requires the housing assistance paid under specified Federal programs to be excluded from the income and resources of the housing residents for purposes of determining their eligibility for, and amount of, benefits under any other Federal assistance program.

titles.title: A bill to provide that housing assistance paid with respect to certain dwelling units shall be excluded from the income and resources of the occupants of such units for purposes of other Federal assistance programs.
